none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2020-05-max-nordile/extracted/Max Nordile - Sleep/07 Ants On The Wall
Max Nordile - Go To Sleep, Fool
Max Nordile - Go To Sleep, Fool

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on May 27, 2020 Description from Terminal Escape:
True mutant sounds from one of the fellows from VIOLENCE CREEPS, already mutants in their own collective rite. Audio collages, damaged sounds, psychedelic pop from another dimension. For the (few) people who will get the reference, this takes me back to the minimal recordings of ARTHUR STONE or other, related, drug addled Mission District creations from a long lost decade. It might also or alternately be free jazz for the new age.   GO TO SLEEP, FOOL! You can find physical copies of this one and a pile of other weird shit at Digital Regress.  Be careful though. 
https://digitalregress.bandcamp.com/music
